definition: variant of 匹[pi3]/classifier for cloth: bolt
classifier for horses, mules etc/Taiwan pr. [pi1]/ordinary person/classifier for cloth: bolt/horsepower
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
The rise and fall of the nation concerns everyone (idiom). Everyone bears responsibility for the prosperity of society.
pinyin: guo2 jia1 xing1 wang2 , pi3 fu1 you3 ze2

definition: The rise and fall of the nation concerns everyone (idiom). Everyone bears responsibility for the prosperity of society.
pinyin: tian1 xia4 xing1 wang2 , pi3 fu1 you3 ze2

sentences.english: As thy caitiff carcase soon shall know.
sentences.chinese: 你这匹夫马上就会知道我的厉害。

sentences.english: Simple folk such as myself can not be compared with you.
sentences.chinese: 象我这样的匹夫确实无法与你相比。

sentences.english: Even an ordinary individual can have a high spiritual quotient.
sentences.chinese: 其实即使是一介匹夫依旧可以拥有高尚的情操。

sentences.english: Every man has a share of responsibility for the fate of his country.
"The fortunes of" be equal to everyone no responsibility.
sentences.chinese: “天下兴亡，匹夫有责”等于大家无责。

definition: rebels and traitors (idiom)/general term for scoundrel
(derog.) old but still alive/old fart/old bastard
